TextView.android:text: Top Trumps is a simple game. Each player has to get all of his opponent's cards to win the game. So how do you win your opponents cards? Easy! Each Top Trumps card has a number of stats on it that enable you compare that card with all of the others in the deck. Your job is to select a stat on your card that you think is relatively strong and would give you the best chance of beating your opponent's card. The problem is you don't know what card your opponent has, so even if you choose the strongest available stat, it's no guarantee that you'll win that hand. The trick is to familiarise yourself with the cards in the deck, the more stats you learn, the more chance you will choose the winning stat!
